articles.title: Five thoughts as Gilas Pilipinas bounce back with emphatic FIBA Asia Cup win over India - ESPN
articles.description: As Gilas Pilipinas picked up their first win at the 2022 FIBA Asia Cup, here's what we learned from their 101-59 win over India on Friday.
articles.content:
Gilas Pilipinas booked a much-needed bounce-back win at the 2022 FIBA Asia Cup in Jakarta after thrashing India, 101-59, on Friday to get their campaign back on track.
